title: Diamond Heart Petal Earrings
materials: 18K Yellow Gold (approximately 3.970 grams). Set with meticulously selected round brilliant cut diamonds of VS clarity. Finished with a high-shine Hyderabadi polish.
features: Delicate heart-shaped design with clustered diamond petals. Each diamond is precisely set to maximize brilliance and create a stunning floral motif. The design seamlessly blends modern aesthetics with a touch of traditional South Indian delicacy.
colors: Warm yellow gold and dazzling white diamonds.
occasions: and modern festive occasions like Diwali celebrations.
description: Timeless design with a contemporary twist. The heart shape symbolizes love and affection, while the diamonds represent enduring beauty. Crafted with meticulous attention to detail and the highest quality materials, these earrings are a treasured addition to any jewelry collection.
